text:
Position: Data Scientist

Responsibilities:
- Analyze business problems and build machine learning models.
- Experience with Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, and NLP tools.
- Deploy ML models using Flask or FastAPI.
- Experience with Tableau or Power BI is a plus.

Requirements:
- 2+ years of experience in Data Science or Machine Learning.
- Strong understanding of NLP and feature engineering.

Position: Backend Developer

Responsibilities:
- Design and build scalable REST APIs using FastAPI or Django.
- Work with SQL and NoSQL databases.
- Integrate third-party APIs and services.

Requirements:
- 1–3 years of backend experience.
- Strong skills in Python, Flask/FastAPI, Docker, and Git.
- Understanding of microservices and cloud deployment (AWS preferred).

Name: Rohan Sharma
Email: rohan.sharma@example.com
Phone: +91 9876543210

Objective:
Enthusiastic Software Engineer with 2 years of experience in backend development and API design.

Skills:
- Python, FastAPI, Flask, SQLAlchemy
- MySQL, PostgreSQL
- Docker, Git, REST APIs

Experience:
- Software Engineer at TechNova (2022–Present)
  Worked on developing microservices for financial data processing using FastAPI.

Education:
B.Tech in Computer Science, Delhi University, 2021

Name: Aditi Verma
Email: aditi.verma@example.com
Phone: +91 9988776655

Objective:
Passionate Data Scientist with expertise in NLP and predictive modeling.

Skills:
- Python, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn
- NLP, Text Classification, TF-IDF, Word2Vec
- Tableau, Power BI

Experience:
- Data Analyst at DataNest (2021–2023)
  Developed customer churn prediction models and automated reporting dashboards.

Education:
M.Sc. in Data Science, Mumbai University, 2021

Name: Karan Mehta
Email: karan.mehta@example.com
Phone: +91 9090909090

Objective:
Machine Learning Engineer with strong experience in model deployment and MLOps.

Skills:
- Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn
- AWS, Docker, CI/CD, FastAPI
- Model deployment, API integration

Experience:
- ML Engineer at CloudAI (2020–Present)
  Deployed scalable ML models for fraud detection and image classification.

Education:
B.Tech in Information Technology, VIT, 2020
